name: BlackHole Of Secrets
description:
Hi, this is my first game jame. This game was created for the Brackeys Game Jame 2020.1

This game is like a black hole simulation. You can move around in the galaxy, can pull object to yourself,  have to "shoot" that don't explode, etc. 

Control: You are the black hole.

- Use W,A,S,D or the arrows to moving around,

- Use the mouse to looking around,

- Use "space" to shoot, to lose temperature,

- Use "escape" to go back to the menu.

Credits:

David Kohalmi - programing, design

#BrackeysGameJam2020.1
